TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Cinyuey, title = Cinyuey, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cinyuey} }

S.FORM: = Cinyuey = Thnganan alang Cinyuey. Thuyang alang Tqriyan tru dgiyaq ka Cin-yuey-cun, kingal ka mquri gsilung, kkana o mqpah dxgal, ciway ka mqpah ppanan, seejiq Nan-aw-tay-ya Ce-aw-rey ka dhiya, ida qriyan knmalu bi kndkilan ni ngngalan idankiya ka alang dha, kiya ni ida dhiya nanaq ka iqan saw nii gaya Tay-ya. Alang Cin-yuey ga niqanhbaraw bi ka seejiq mkla smaluana manu qyqaya, saw gayathjingan, gaya tmsamac, mndaan alang sbiyaw, tminunqwarux, tminun pala, smaluqqhuni, Sayun shlayan rmgri Cin-yuey, uuyas dnii. Nniqan alang I-ran-seyn Nan-aw-syang Cin-yuey-cun Klbangan Nniq yo-an pey-si ta-Nan-aw ni mseupu yayung Daya gqiyan hidaw Ru-pi o wada niqan 1km Kndkilan lnglingay Kklaan ppanan Mgriq nanaq rulu: kndadax Tay-9 seyn 137.7 km, priyux elu Cang-cun can-yey muda Pi-hu-cun hakaw Tgkingal spgan Cin-yuey hiqurigi musa ruwan Cin-yuey-cun. Mlutuc syusan teyn-c Nniqan seejiq alang Syusan teyn-c alang Skari kari Kari Atayal. Snhiyaan Pnyahan alang Kndadaxsnpuan (U-ta sbiyaw) ni (Ryo-sin) dha alang sbiyaw nii ka alangCin-yuey, mnda thjinghini hinika ci-twan Tanah tunux hngkawas siida ni muda thjingalang ka kwo-min-cn-fu, kndudug thjing Cin-yuey. Seejiq(U-ta sbiyaw) ka pnlalaynniq alang Cin-yuey, si-yueyn hngkawas 1915(ta-cn hngkawas4), kika Hayung-naban(Ha- yung No-pan) o madas wadaniqan 100 seejiq musa thjingKa-nan-ran, wada ka knkingalidas do, wada niqan naqih naru, hbaraw ka wada mhuqil, kiya ka kiya ni wasa brinah nniqan dhaplalay kkana duri, wana 13 sapah 72 seejiq trangi nniq Ka-na-ran. 13 sapah 72 sejiq kska nii o yasatqiisug, wada thjing ising alangYahallan (Ya-ha-ran) tnhanganKang-c-tu duri, hraan Hidaw Pi-hu-cun sayan, phiyug nanaq ising ka alangSkba-bo (S-pa-po) se, ta-cnhngkawas 14(si-yueynhngkawas 1925) Muda paru sbgirur ni quyux ka alang hini, qliyan 16 sapah, Kika thjing (alang Ru-pi, alangCin-yuey sayan). Kklaan rgigan Tglaq Cin-yue Tglaq Cin-yuey ga pska dgiyaqka nniqan dha, saw knmalubiqtaan, tdha ka tglaq, kndadax10m mtucing dhuq truma, mlaqssiyaw ka qsiya, knhuway knhuwaymsasug Qluli truma, mtasaw ka qsiya qtaan kana ka dhuq truma. Ini tduwa rrigan ka tglaq Cin-yuey, klahan nanaq ka rmigawseejiq. i-Tribe 參考資料 i-Tribe: == php/ryohen-sightseeing bnatas ==

= Cinyoey = Thnganan alang Cinyoey. Thoyang alang Tqriyan tro dgiyaq ka Cin-yoey-con, kingal ka mqori gsilong, kkana o mqpah dxgal, ciway ka mqpah ppanan, seejiq Nan-aw-tay-ya Ce-aw-rey ka dhiya, ida qriyan knmalo bi kndkilan ni ngngalan idankiya ka alang dha, kiya ni ida dhiya nanaq ka iqan saw nii gaya Tay-ya. Alang Cin-yoey ga niqanhbaraw bi ka seejiq mkla smaloana mano qyqaya, saw gayathjingan, gaya tmsamac, mndaan alang sbiyaw, tminonqwarox, tminon pala, smaloqqhoni, Sayon shlayan rmgri Cin-yoey, ooyas dnii. Nniqan alang I-ran-seyn Nan-aw-syang Cin-yoey-con Klbangan Nniq yo-an pey-si ta-Nan-aw ni mseopo yayong Daya gqiyan hidaw Ro-pi o wada niqan 1km Kndkilan lnglingay Kklaan ppanan Mgriq nanaq rolo: kndadax Tay-9 seyn 137.7 km, priyox elo Cang-con can-yey moda Pi-ho-con hakaw Tgkingal spgan Cin-yoey hiqorigi mosa rowan Cin-yoey-con. Mlotoc syosan teyn-c Nniqan seejiq alang Syosan teyn-c alang Skari kari Kari Atayal. Snhiyaan Pnyahan alang Kndadaxsnpoan (U-ta sbiyaw) ni (Ryo-sin) dha alang sbiyaw nii ka alangCin-yoey, mnda thjinghini hinika ci-twan Tanah tonox hngkawas siida ni moda thjingalang ka kwo-min-cn-fo, kndodog thjing Cin-yoey. Seejiq(U-ta sbiyaw) ka pnlalaynniq alang Cin-yoey, si-yoeyn hngkawas 1915(ta-cn hngkawas4), kika Hayong-naban(Ha- yong No-pan) o madas wadaniqan 100 seejiq mosa thjingKa-nan-ran, wada ka knkingalidas do, wada niqan naqih naro, hbaraw ka wada mhoqil, kiya ka kiya ni wasa brinah nniqan dhaplalay kkana dori, wana 13 sapah 72 seejiq trangi nniq Ka-na-ran. 13 sapah 72 sejiq kska nii o yasatqiisog, wada thjing ising alangYahallan (Ya-ha-ran) tnhanganKang-c-to dori, hraan Hidaw Pi-ho-con sayan, phiyog nanaq ising ka alangSkba-bo (S-pa-po) se, ta-cnhngkawas 14(si-yoeynhngkawas 1925) Moda paro sbgiror ni qoyox ka alang hini, qliyan 16 sapah, Kika thjing (alang Ro-pi, alangCin-yoey sayan). Kklaan rgigan Tglaq Cin-yoe Tglaq Cin-yoey ga pska dgiyaqka nniqan dha, saw knmalobiqtaan, tdha ka tglaq, kndadax10m mtocing dhoq troma, mlaqssiyaw ka qsiya, knhoway knhowaymsasog Qloli troma, mtasaw ka qsiya qtaan kana ka dhoq troma. Ini tdowa rrigan ka tglaq Cin-yoey, klahan nanaq ka rmigawseejiq. i-Tribe 參考資料 i-Tribe: == php/ryohen-sightseeing bnatas ==
